text: Afraid of the Dark is a 1991 French British drama movie directed by Mark Peploe and starring James Fox, Clare Holman, Fanny Ardant, Paul McGann, Robert Stephens, Susan Wooldridge, David Thewlis, Catriona MacColl, Hilary Mason, Niven Boyd, Gwyneth Strong, Laurence Harrington, Frederick Treves. ==Other websites== * * == Reference List == Category:1991 drama movies Category:1990s British drama movies Category:French drama movies
title: Afraid of the Dark
